description:
Yosano needs some shopping done. Rampo offers to do it for her. Kyouka comes home with a lost cat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Operation Errand Run / Finders Kyouka`s / Rampo-san`s Day Well Spent
Otsukai Daisakusen / Kyouka no Hiroimono / Ranpo-san no Orikou na Ichinichi
おつかい大作戦 / 鏡花の拾いもの / 乱歩さんのお利口な一日
